title: pAhi pAhi shrI gajAnana
sahitya:
pAhi pAhi shrI gajAnana pArvatI tanaya bhujaga bhUSaNa


anupallavi

  dEhi dEhi sukhamApanna sharaNa dEhi mA vighnam vinAyaka


caraNam 1    sindUra varNa ranjita cidvilAsa mUrtE shubhakIrtE 
bandha vimOcana cAmara karNa bhavya sEvya bhakta brndAvana
    caraNam 2    shinjita maNi manjIra pAda shrita lOka sakala vidyA dAyaka
manjuLa vESa mUSaka vAhana mandagamana mahAnubhAva
    caraNam 3    vAmana vigraha sadAshivanuta vAmadEvAnka pIThArOhaNa
hEmavanananuta munijana pOSaNa kAmAkSa dIna sharaNya
